.@teamjltcondor and Alex Frame claim another stage win to finish the #NZCC. @IsoWheySwissWel Joe Cooper the overall… https://t.co/evXmFnxJ4F
Evans takes green jersey winning all 3 sprints today. 5 man break still has 1 min gap but it's closing #NZCC
Break of five, including third placed James Oram with NZL teammate Evans, have a gap of 1.31 on peloton after 54km #NZCC
Final stage of the #NZCC 30 mins away. Joe Cooper in yellow for the 12 laps of the 10km circuit https://t.co/3nlAlIyZpr
Looks as though Joe Cooper will take yellow from James Oram after a sensational fourth stage. Unconfirmed. Mould a… https://t.co/co60ZzZrSp
Riders all over the road. These five have joined a lead group of four, including Hamish Bond, as we enter M'Borough… https://t.co/gUpEHsgWtY
Mould caught, race back together. Won't be for long though, attacks aplenty. #NZCC stage four

@HamishBidwell have I snaked a byline off @mark_geenty today? Didn't have time to grab a copy of our illustrious publication this morning
.@BenChickenwings of @oliversracing takes out the sprint through Greytown to defend team-mate's green jersey lead… https://t.co/lfLwg0SwOJ
.@teamjltcondor Alex Frame, their 'token Kiwi' as he puts it, wins stage three #NZCC in a sprint finish. Repays the hard work of his team
Catch is made, about 12km. Immediate attacks from all the other teams now #NZCC
2 laps to go around Martinborough, @teamjltcondor have the gap down to 33 sec as they try setup a sprint finish for Clancy/Frame #NZCC
.@teamjltcondor leading the chase of the four-man break on stage 3 at the #NZCC 2.31 the gap with 40km to go, crack… https://t.co/DBIIz6HBbK
Is bowling bodyline at tailenders the lowest form of cricket? #NZvBAN @BLACKCAPS
Sam Crome wins stage two of #NZCC but NZ national team rider James Oram into yellow after 2nd up Admiral Hill.
Luke Mudgway, Nick Reddish, Dylan Newberry and Morgan Smith in the break but IsoWhey starting to lead peloton back #NZCC
Tough day for Wizwireless' Chris Thomas. Crashed then broken derailer up a hill forces him to withdraw #NZCC four riders 3min clear @ front
Early drama with 5-rider crash 25km into stage two of #NZCC. Sign Factory's Charles Salmon out, four other riders b… https://t.co/dEvpVugUlY
All set for stage two of #NZCC. Toughest day today 147km up Admiral Hill. Hamish Bond good to go after fall yesterd… https://t.co/XiB4tCqdIy

4 leading riders get a break of 1.07 on the pelaton about 40km to go. #NZCC Van der Ploeg, Mould, Kerry, Gordon off… https://t.co/2ozuHVtb9Z
12-man break trying to get away. Blindz Direct with Hamish Bond driving the chasing pelaton #NZCC https://t.co/ixhTucEl58
Bond gets back to pelaton minus a timing chip. Meanwhile IsoWhey and Condor each have three riders pushing a break #NZCC
Hamish Bond's cycling education continues, he's crashed in the first 10km of the #NZCC. Wind making it hard to get back but teammate w/ him
A bit wet and a bit windy but the excitement builds as we're 15 mins from start of the NZ Cycle Classic #NZCC https://t.co/j1cWoOhhhq
